topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/547d2b7d6368720e24580000#post_547d2b7d6368720e24580000
I'd shop around a bit more if I was you, though I don't quite feel comfortable trying to shell out advice on what exactly to go for. If you're not looking to build it yourself I reccomend checking out Alienware since they specialize in high end gaming rigs at a relatively cheap price and also microcenter and new egg if you intend to put it together yourself. They usually have the best prices on hardware in my experience.
